name: SwiftVersion
desc: The version of the Swift language to use for compiling Swift sources in the package.

items.name: case v4
items.desc: The identifier for the Swift 4 language standard.

items.name: case v4_2
items.desc: The identifier for the Swift 4.2 language standard.

items.name: case v5
items.desc: The identifier for the Swift 5 language standard.

items.name: case version(String)
items.desc: A user-defined value for the Swift version.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes this value into the given encoder.
